title: Farm boy of Hungary
creator_credit: Vue Touristique Film Studios and Gabor Kalman
brief_description: The pace, feel, and values of the rural way of life that is still a part of Central Europe today. Lajos, a farm boy, is shown living the normal life in Hungary. Modern conveniences may be lacking, but Lajos and his family “have everything we need”.
